item.title: Spring构建restfulWebService
item.description: Spring构建restfulWebService 这是官网提供的一个例子，这里练习。 实际上这里用的是Springboot来创建的。 What You Will Build build a service that will accept HTTP GET requests at http://localhost:8080/greeting. It will respond with a JSON representation of a greeting, as the following listing shows: {"id":1,"content":"Hello, World!"} You can customize the greeting with an optional name parameter in the query string, as the following listing shows: http://localhost:8080/greeting?name=User The name parameter value overrides the default value of World and is reflected in the response, as the following listing shows:
